Guidelines: 1. Choose easy to understand and short names for variables and functions. Example Bad: isOverEighteen(), good: isLegalAge().
2. Variable and function names should be full words, using camel case with a lowercase first letter.
5. Put all declarations at the top of each script or function.
6. Initialize variables when you declare them
10. Stick to a Strict Coding Style
11. Comment as Much as Needed but Not More
12. Use Shortcut Notations Example Bad: var student_name; var student_age; good: var student_name, student_age;
13. Keep your code modularized and specialized.
14. Avoid creating a lot of JavaScript dependent code.
